summary: This mod changes visual appearance of Borgakh the Steel Heart. THIS MOD IS 100% SAFE TO USE AND COMPATIBLE.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]THIS MOD WORKS WITHOUT ESP PLUGIN.
SO IT MEANS, THIS MOD IS 100% SAFE TO USE AND IT IS COMPATIBLE WITH ALL LANGUAGES AND FOLLOWER OVERHAULS.[/b][/center]
[i][b]DESCRIPTION
[/b][/i]
This mod changes visual appearance of Borgakh the Steel Heart, an Orc follower, who is already exist in Skyrim game and could be found at Mor Khazgur. [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Borgakh_the_Steel_Heart]WIKIA page about her.[/url]

[i]LORE WISE.[/i] Borgakh is not fully adult yet, at least by Orc standards, so she supposed to look young. Also, she is a future bride, so she supposed to be good looking.
 

[i][b]OVERVIEW
[/b][/i]
- This mod is STANDALONE, no other mods are required.
- This mod is absolutely safe to use.
- This mod is 100% compatible with ALL localizations.
- This mod is 100% compatible with follower overhauls mods, like “Ultimate Follower Overhaul”.
- Optional version for compatibility with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40038/?]“BijinWarmaidens”[/url] mod.
 

[i]NOTE[/i]. This mod does not have exclusive texture path. It is possible to make a version with new path for face and eyes textures, not for body though, but I don't really wanna do it. I am just a performance maniac and I don't like unnecessary extra assets in game :D. You can do it yourself, if you know how to use NifSkope.


[i]WARNING![/i] This mod may not be compatible with other mods, that change Borgakh appearance. In that case, you can edit such mod with TES5Edit and remove Borgakh entry. Or, you can use my optional ESP plugin.


[i]SPECIAL THANKS[/i] to Apachii, for allowing me to use hair from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]“ApachiiSkyHair”[/url] mod.


[i][b]MANUAL INSTALLATION
[/b][/i]
Just extract it in “...\Skyrim\Data”.


[i][b]MANUAL UNINSTALL
[/b][/i]
1. Delete folder “Borgakh” from “…Skyrim\Data\textures\actors\character\”
2. Delete file “00019959.dds” from “…Skyrim\Data\textures\actors\character\facegendata\facetint\skyrim.esm\”
3. Delete file “00019959.NIF” from “…Skyrim\Data\meshes\actors\character\facegendata\facegeom\skyrim.esm\”
author: AlexSlesh

files.name: Borgakh New Appearance for Bijin Warmaidens
